participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: energetic and competitive with a passion for sports.
participant_1.background: i'm 13 years old. i ride the bus to school. i hate math class. i'm on the soccer team.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: determined and imaginative, still holding on to dreams of artistic expression.
participant_2.background: i'm a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be pretty but time hasn't been kind. i used to be a painter but now i am a housekeeper.
